CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Silicon - This is the material of the wafer on which the OTFTs are fabricated.
2. Nitrogen - This is the gas used for fabrication of the OTFTs.

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Silicon
2. Nitrogen
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. Silicon

So, the only material name mentioned in the paragraph is:

1. Silicon

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Silicon |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Field effect mobility: This is the entity being measured in the paragraph.
2. OTFT: This stands for Organic Thin-Film Transistor, which is the type of transistor used in the fabrication of the devices.
3. Silicon wafer: This is the material on which the OTFTs are fabricated.
4. Channel length: This is a parameter of the OTFT, representing the length of the channel through which the charge carriers flow.
5. Width: This is another parameter of the OTFT, representing the width of the channel.
6. Nitrogen: This is the ambient gas used in the fabrication process.

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

Field effect mobility
OTFT
Silicon wafer
Channel length
Width
Nitrogen
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. Field effect mobility: This is a material property that refers to the ability of charge carriers to move through a material under an electric field.
2. Silicon: This is a material property that refers to the material used in the fabrication of the devices.

So, the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the paragraph are:

Field effect mobility
Silicon

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to Material Property in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Field effect mobility |
| Silicon |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. Length of the channel (L) - 12 μm
2. Width of the channel (W) - 120 μm
3. Thickness of the silicon wafer (not explicitly mentioned)

These are the properties of the silicon wafer on which the OTFTs are fabricated.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. Length of the channel (L) - 12 μm
2. Width of the channel (W) - 120 μm

These are the values of the material properties of the silicon wafer, specifically the length and width of the channel.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 12 μm |
| 120 μm |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
